data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Grenadines to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grenadines, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help 22 new simple churches start among the 110,600 people in the state of Grenadines, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Grenadines, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Grenadines, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Port Elizabeth
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Port Elizabeth, Grenadines, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Grenadines, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Grenadines do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.focus_label: Grenadines, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Grenadines prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Grenadines
location.full_name: Grenadines, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
